citations.desc: INSTITUTIONAL ANIMAL CARE AND USE COMMITTEE (IACUC).
citations.narrative:
Item IACUC 2.31 e 3
At the time of inspection the facility was housing peromyscus mice in a reverse light cycle. A review of the protocol
failed to indicate this in the protocol.
The investigator needs to incorporate and submit an amendment about the light cycle into the protocol for
approval by the IACUC
Correct by 3/30/15
An exit interview took place at the end of inspection

narrative:
